thread.title: 'Star Wars: The Force Awakens' Trailer Makes Daisy Ridley Cry
thread.title_full: 'Star Wars: The Force Awakens' Trailer Makes Daisy Ridley Cry

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: 'Star Wars: The Force Awakens' Trailer Makes Daisy Ridley Cry
text:
Comments The 23-year-old actress cried after she watched the trailer, saying that she was 'so incredibly awed' to be part of the incredible legacy. 
Following the final trailer of " Star Wars: The Force Awakens ", many people shared their excitement and even fan theories about the sci-fi movie. Actress Daisy Ridley also expressed her happiness through social media, posting a video on Instagram which shows herself crying. "Totally emotional seeing it for the first time and so so so incredibly awed to be part of this incredible legacy," Ridley captioned the video. Based on the caption she wrote, the video was taken by her friend. It shows the British actress watching the trailer with his smartphone. She shows a series of expressions before finally crying and saying, "Oh my god, it's amazing!" A video posted by @daisyridley on Oct 19, 2015 at 8:06pm PDT Other celebrities who also expressed their admirations were Chris Pratt and Elizabeth Banks . "I think it looks absolutely awesome. So pumped for #StarWars ! Plus I'm down for anything with #OscarIsaac," Pratt wrote. Banks also told fans via Twitter that she was "geeked out" after she watched the trailer. J.J. Abrams directs the movie with a script he co-wrote with Lawrence Kasdan. The movie brings back Harrison Ford as Han Solo, Mark Hamill as Luke Skywalker and Carrie Fisher as Princess Leia. Other names in the lineup are Adam Driver , John Boyega , Oscar Isaac , Lupita Nyong'o , Andy Serkis , Domhnall Gleeson , Anthony Daniels, Peter Mayhew and Max Von Sydow . The seventh episode of "Star Wars" movie franchise will be released Statesides on December 18.
